text: In Leipzig, several people had downloaded the 32 bit. Many examples crash in this situation. We need to push users towards the 64bit.
title: Indicate to people to install the Python 64 anaconda version
Indicate to people to install the Python 64 anaconda version

text: Do you have a log of the crash? Something related to memory I guess. If the error cannot be catched (this is the case I guess) we should put a refernce to that issue somewhere so that people can google it.
MemoryError is the likely culprit. Off the top of my head, on Windows there is something like a 2GB limit on 32 bit processes, which is very likely to be exceeded by nilearn.
